parentTaskName: ISO/IEC TR 24029-1 - AI Assessment of the Robustness of Neural Networks
taskDescription: This step plans the tests that demonstrate robustness. Please fill out all required information to create a testing protocol according to ISO-24029-1.

taskItems.title: 1. Define objective
taskItems.description: Define the objective of your planned testing.

components.content: Define the objective here, i.e. to assess the robustness of a specific neural network model.

taskItems.title: 2. Specify Scope
taskItems.description: Specify the scope of the testing including the model type, intended use case, and any relevant requirements and constraints.

taskItems.title: 3. Testing Requirements and Criteria
taskItems.description: Set your testing requirements and criteria to ensure the robustness of your system.
taskItems.implementationGuidance: Metrics are set based on your input from the previous task **State Robustness Goals**. If not done yet, please complete that task first.

taskItems.title: 4. Test Scenarios
taskItems.description: Define test scenarios to simulate potential threats to robustness, e.g. adversarial attacks, data drift, and other potential risks.

taskItems.title: 5. Dataset Description
taskItems.description: Provide details of the datasets used for robustness testing, including source, size, distribution, and preprocessing steps.

taskItems.title: 6. Data Augmentation
taskItems.description: Describe any Data Augmentation methods used to to simulate real-world scenarios.

taskItems.title: 7. Baseline Data
taskItems.description: List baseline data samples for comparison and specify any synthetic data used to evaluate robustness.

taskItems.title: 8. Testing Phases
taskItems.description: Describe any Data Augmentation methods used to to simulate real-world scenarios.

taskItems.title: 9. Testing Execution Plan
taskItems.description: List baseline data samples for comparison and specify any synthetic data used to evaluate robustness.

taskItems.title: 10. Risk Assessment
taskItems.description: Identify potential risks that might affect testing, such as limitations in test coverage or possible inaccuracies in simulated scenarios.

taskItems.title: 11. Reporting and Documentation
taskItems.description: Define the documentation and reporting format for each test, including how results will be logged, how anomalies will be recorded, and how test findings will be analyzed. Final Report Structure: Provide guidelines for compiling the test results into a comprehensive report on robustness, detailing pass/fail outcomes for each scenario and potential areas of improvement.

components.content: Document reporting and documentation format here.

taskItems.title: 12. Approval and Review Process
taskItems.description: Specify who will review and approve the testing protocol, test results, and any modifications to the protocol.
